description: A purely-polymer printed copy of HK416A5, a modern descendant of the AR15 line of carbines. Less durable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A purely-polymer printed copy of Remington 700, a sniper rifle popular with law enforcement agencies. This version does not have a magazine: it is a single-round bolt-action rifle - perhaps an an experiment or a design challenge. Less durable than its market counterpart, though more so than other Private Defense firearms.
